refnamediv.refpurpose: This is for internal use only.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This control should never appear in the VSPX source. It is for internal use only. Before applying XML schema validation to the page, Virtuoso replaces non-VSPX tags with this one when they reside outside v:page.

formalpara.title: debug-srcfile
formalpara.para: URI of the source document where the tag comes from.

formalpara.title: debug-srcline
formalpara.para: Line number in the source document where the tag comes from.

formalpara.title: debug-log
formalpara.para: This defines what sort of data are saved to the debugging log.

refsect1.title: Declaration of type vspx_xsd_stub_top
refsect1.screen: create type vspx_xsd_stub_top under vspx_control as ( vc_stub any ) temporary self as ref
